name: bian1d
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w3), wa(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w3), wa(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, wa(w1, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w3), wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, wa(w1, w3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w2, wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, wa(w1, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w3), wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, wa(w1, w3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w3), wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w3), w1))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w3), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w3), w1))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w3), w2))

|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w3), w2))
-| wi(wa(w1, w3), w1)

|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w3), w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w3), w2))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, wa(w1, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, wa(w1, w3)))

comment: Adding a superfluous conjunct in a biconditional. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Feb-2017.)
